channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【.NET 10 Preview 1 is now available!】.NET 10预览1现在可用！
item.description: 【Find out about the new features in .NET 10 Preview 1 across the .NET runtime, SDK, libraries, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, C#, .NET MAUI, and more!】在.NET 10预览1中查找.NET运行时，SDK，Libraries，ASP.NET Core，Blazor，C＃，.Net Maui等！

item.title: 【.NET Aspire 9.1 is here with six great new dashboard features, and more!】.NET ASPIRE 9.1在这里具有六个出色的新仪表板功能，等等！
item.description: 【.NET Aspire 9.1 is here! From enhanced dashboard capabilities like Resource Relationships and Localization Overrides to improved Docker integration and flexible console logs, this release is packed with tools to streamline your development process.】.NET ASPIRE 9.1在这里！从增强的仪表板功能（例如资源关系和本地化替代）到改进的Docker集成和灵活的控制台日志，此版本包含用于简化开发过程的工具。

item.title: 【Azure SDK Release (February 2025)】Azure SDK发布（2025年2月）
item.description: 【Azure SDK releases every month. In this post, you find this month's highlights and release notes.】Azure SDK每月发布。在这篇文章中，您可以找到本月的亮点和发行说明。

item.title: 【Terminal Chat now included in GitHub Copilot Free】github copilot中现在包含的终端聊天免费
item.description: 【Windows Terminal Canary users can now use Terminal Chat with the GitHub Copilot Free plan! 🚀 GitHub Copilot Free is limited to 50 chat messages per month. This includes the usage of Copilot in the CLI, VS Code, and Visual Studio. If you reach your quota, you can upgrade on the web. You can sign […]】Windows Terminal Canary用户现在可以使用GitHub Copilot免费计划使用终端聊天！ 🚀GitHub Copilot Free每月限制为50个聊天消息。这包括在CLI，VS代码和Visual Studio中使用Copilot。如果您达到配额，则可以在网络上升级。您可以签署[…]

item.title: 【Announcing the Public Preview of the Azure Cosmos DB SDK for Rust!】宣布Rust的Azure Cosmos DB SDK的公开预览！
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce the public preview of the Azure Cosmos DB SDK for Rust, a native Rust SDK that enables developers to interact with Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL accounts from their Rust applications. Following the release of Azure SDK for Rust Beta, the Azure Cosmos DB Rust SDK provides an idiomatic API for […]】我们很高兴宣布Rust的Azure Cosmos DB SDK的公开预览，Rust是一种本地Rust SDK，使开发人员能够与Azure Cosmos DB互动，从其Rust应用程序中为NOSQL帐户进行互动。在发布Azure SDK的Rust Beta之后，Azure Cosmos DB Rust SDK为[…]提供了惯用的API

item.title: 【Exciting new T-SQL features: Regex support, Fuzzy string-matching, and bigint support in DATEADD – preview】令人兴奋的新T-SQL功能：DateAdd中的正则支持，模糊字符串匹配和BigInt支持 - 预览
item.description: 【We are thrilled to announce the public preview of three powerful T-SQL features that will elevate your SQL queries: Regular Expressions (Regex) support, Fuzzy string-matching, and bigint support in DATEADD. These enhancements are now available in Azure SQL Database and SQL Database in Microsoft Fabric, offering developers more flexibility, efficiency, and precision in their data […]】我们很高兴地宣布，公开预览了三个强大的T-SQL功能，这些功能将提升您的SQL查询：正则表达式（REGEX）支持，模糊字符串匹配和DATEADD中的BigInt支持。这些增强功能现在可以在Microsoft Fabric的Azure SQL数据库和SQL数据库中获得，从而为开发人员提供了更大的灵活性，效率和精度[…]

item.title: 【Using Powershell7 with Managed Runcommand】将PowerShell7与托管runco​​mmand一起使用
item.description: 【Today, all scripts run through Managed RunCommand will by default use Powershell 5. What if you have a script that requires Powershell7? This is supported via a new feature, but you will need to specify the different script shell. Here’s what you need to do. Ensure your VM has Powershell7 Powershell7 is not installed by […]】如今，所有脚本都通过托管RunCommand运行的所有脚本将默认使用PowerShell 5。如果您有一个需要PowerShell7的脚本，该怎么办？这是通过新功能支持的，但是您需要指定不同的脚本外壳。这是您需要做的。确保您的VM具有powerShell7 PowerShell7未安装[…]

item.title: 【Migrating data from DynamoDB to Azure Cosmos DB】将数据从DynamoDB迁移到Azure Cosmos DB
item.description: 【Co-authors: RK Iyer, Mangal Dutta Migrating stateful systems, such as databases, is a complex process. A frequent requirement for customers is to transfer data from DynamoDB to Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL. This process involves several stages, including exporting data from DynamoDB, performing necessary transformations, and importing the data into Azure Cosmos DB. Common migration […]】合着者：RK Iyer，Mangal Dutta迁移的状态系统（例如数据库）是一个复杂的过程。对于客户来说，经常要求的是，对于NOSQL，将数据从DynamoDB转移到Azure Cosmos DB。此过程涉及多个阶段，包括从DynamoDB中导出数据，执行必要的转换以及将数据导入Azure Cosmos DB。普通迁移[…]
